summary: Forbes is an American business magazine started in 1917 by B.C. Forbes. It's now owned by an investment group from Hong Kong. The magazine, based in New Jersey, is published eight times a year and covers business, finance, investing, and more. It's known for its lists like the richest Americans (Forbes 400), 30 under 30, and The World's Billionaires. Steve Forbes is the editor-in-chief, and its motto is "Change the World." It has international editions and competitors like Fortune and Bloomberg Businessweek.
title: Forbes
